content: welcome your newest arrival with the making waves baby blanket - a cozy textured wavy ripple blanket after the first 3 row this becomes an easy one-row repeat style of blanket colour changes happen at the end of every second row so the yarn can be carried up the side of the blanket to ensure that there are only a couple of ends to weave in at the end of the project you can customize your blanket with the colours you use - choose as many or as few colours as you d like > the free pattern for the baby blanket size 38 x 40 can be found ** here 1 ** > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout skill level intermediate language english crochet terminology us terms stitches chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet modified double_crochet sizes the pdf includes instructions for 7 blanket sizes baby 38 x 40 lapghan 42 x 55 small throw 53 x 65 medium throw 60 x 76 large throw 71 x 85 queen 92 x 91 and king 107 x 102 > other details * 5 0mm crochet hook needed * medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design * pattern has been tech edited * the pdf also includes step-by-step pictures and a video tutorial * the printable pdf is a total of 17 pages i hope you enjoy making and using your blanket 1 https //thispixiecreates com/ripple-baby-blanket/
